import ReactGA from'react-ga';export var initGA=function initGA(){ReactGA.initialize('G-KR4JLWWJ8R');// Replace with your Google Analytics tracking ID
};export var logPageView=function logPageView(){ReactGA.pageview(window.location.pathname+window.location.search);};export var logEvent=function logEvent(category,action){ReactGA.event({category:category,action:action});};export var trackDailyVisits=function trackDailyVisits(){ReactGA.set({dimension1:new Date().toISOString().slice(0,10)});ReactGA.event({category:'Daily Metrics',action:'Visit'});};export var trackUsageTime=function trackUsageTime(startTime){var currentTime=new Date();var elapsedTimeInSeconds=(currentTime-startTime)/1000;ReactGA.timing({category:'Daily Metrics',variable:'Usage Time',value:elapsedTimeInSeconds});};
